column1: payman-jalalzaei-002193a3,PAYMAN,JALALZAEI,Principal Process Engineer at Worley Canada Service Ltd.,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E03AQHwpf5tLCJwSA/profile-displayphoto-shrink_800_800/0/1517237543873?e=1697673600&v=beta&t=xsvtx6WqvxjxeDw8b_9StvvXh2ZWL6UL7L0Dg1CsBlg,,personal,ACoAABXq6UIB-iQYn_SMK0ApHqj2g0emZr5Kt0U,367716674,,"
column2: A Lead Process Engineer with more than 26 year experience in oil and gas industry including  Enhanced oil recovery (SAGD), heavy oil upgrading, refinery, sour gas treating, water treatment, petrochemical and gas plant.
Broad experience in execution of project from conceptual design, front end engineering design (FEED), detailed design, construction, commissioning and start-up.
Strong knowledge in simulating, revamping, equipment sizing and trouble shooting.
Hands on experience with simulation software such as Hysys, ProMax, Pipesys, Aspen Plus, UniSim Design, Pro/II, FlareNet, AFT Fathom and HTRI.
Strong knowledge of petroleum applicable codes, standards and regulations including API, ASME, NFPA and familiarity with practices of major operators such as Shell DEPs and BP guidelines.
Participated as a focal person in HAZOP and LOPA on different project phases.
Prepared engineering bid packages and evaluated engineering firms bids.
Experience working in major operating units in Refinery including crude distillation, thermal conversion, LPG recovery, propane refrigeration system, hydrocracker, as well as amine units.
Provided leadership and/or mentoring to junior process engineers.
Self motivation – ability to work and complete tasks with minimal direction and in a timely manner.
Highly organized with strong attention to detail and accuracy.
Strong interpersonal skill and ability to work well all levels of Project.

Knowledge of Quality Management System of ISO 9001/2000.","{'country': None, 'short': 'Canada', 'city': None, 'state': None, 'default': 'Canada'}",False,False,[],"{'primary_locale': {'country': 'US',
